member.name: T:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights
member.summary: Defines the access rights for each DSSP verb.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Lookup
member.summary: The Lookup Request Action identifies a request to recover metadata about the service instance.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Get
member.summary: The Get Request Action identifies a request to retrieve the entire state of a service

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Query
member.summary: Query Request Action identifies a request for a portion of the service state

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.ReadState
member.summary: Combines all the actions that read state without modifying it.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Delete
member.summary: The Delete Request Action identifies a request for deleting a part of the current state of a service.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Insert
member.summary: The Insert Request Action identifies a request to insert an additional resource into a service instance, augmenting its state

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Replace
member.summary: Replace Request Action identifies a request for updating the entire service state atomically (in one step)

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Submit
member.summary: Submit Request Action identifies a request for processing that has no direct state side effects.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Update
member.summary: Update Request Action identifies a request for changing portion of the service state.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Upsert
member.summary: Upsert Request Action identifies a request updating or inserting data into service state.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.ModifyState
member.summary: Combines all the actions that can modify state.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Subscribe
member.summary: Subscribe Request Action identifies a request for listening for state change notifications

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Notify
member.summary: The Notify Request Action identifies a request that has been converted to a notification and contains an additional SOAP header with the source Action that caused this notification

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Subscription
member.summary: Combines the two actions associated with subscriptions

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Create
member.summary: The Create Request Action identifies a request for creating a new instance of a service. The parameters in the Create request carries the information needed to create a service.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.Drop
member.summary: The Drop Request Action identifies a request for shutting down a service instance

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.ServiceControl
member.summary: Combines the actions associated with service lifecycle.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Dss.Runtime.Security.Proxy.DsspRights.All
member.summary: All actions a service can support. This is equivalent to GenericAll
